downloadTitle: From Agile to DevOps at Microsoft Developer Division e-book
downloadDescription: Practices, the tools and culture that the organization needed to evolve as it transformed to the second decade of Agile.

downloadFile.name: From Agile to DevOps at Microsoft Developer Division.pdf
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/7/3/f/73fd407c-abcd-4599-90a6-90ffedfbc9e1/From Agile to DevOps at Microsoft Developer Division.pdf

detailsSection: This book tells a few of the lessons learned as a “box” software company, delivering on premise software releases on a multi-year cadence, became a SaaS provider as well, with continuous delivery from the public cloud.  It covers the DevOps engineering practices, the tools and culture that the organization needed to evolve as it transformed to the second decade of Agile.
detailsSection_file_name: From Agile to DevOps at Microsoft Developer Division.pdf

Windows 8, Windows 7, Windows NT, Windows Vista Adobe Acrobat Reader
